text: Kendall Jenner Gets Animated at Blake Griffin ’ s Basketball Game It looks like Kendall Jenner is still Blake Griffin ‘ s no. 1 fan. The 22 - year - old model cheered on the 28 - year - old basketball star while sitting courtside at Wednesday night ’ s game between the Los Angeles Clippers and the Boston Celtics.
